title: The Aadhya Diamond Pendant - A Timeless Treasure
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds. Diamonds are SI clarity
G-H color grade. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A gracefully designed vanki-inspired pendant featuring an intricate floral center and cascading diamond droplets. The symmetrical winged motif is a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian artistry. All diamonds are pave-set for maximum sparkle and brilliance.
colors: Predominantly shimmering white diamonds contrasted by the warm
rich yellow of the 18K gold setting.
occasions: or a modern twist on traditional bridal jewelry. This pendant elevates any outfit with its understated elegance.
description: This pendant seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with subtle South Indian influences, creating a timeless piece. The high-quality diamonds and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. Its versatile design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary settings.
